Configuring Galah#

To configure your Galah environment, you can specify a number of variables. To see what options are preset, run the following command:

import galah
galah.galah_config()

      Configuration                                              Value
0             email                              amanda.buyan@csiro.au
1      email_notify                                              False
2             atlas                                          Australia
3      data_profile                                                ALA
4             ranks                                                all
5            reason                                                  4
6      usernamegbif                                                   
7      passwordgbif                                                   
8       ala_api_key                                                   
9          clientid                         62dftplmm1q255f96not66g57j
10  client_secretid  1qsiikup2lv483kg770ocke0ejnpkpl9t7tbr7l4vd7fja...

To set any of these options (for example, email), run the following command:

galah.galah_config(email="myemail@example.com")
galah.galah_config()

      Configuration                                              Value
0             email                                myemail@example.com
1      email_notify                                              False
2             atlas                                          Australia
3      data_profile                                                ALA
4             ranks                                                all
5            reason                                                  4
6      usernamegbif                                                   
7      passwordgbif                                                   
8       ala_api_key                                                   
9          clientid                         62dftplmm1q255f96not66g57j
10  client_secretid  1qsiikup2lv483kg770ocke0ejnpkpl9t7tbr7l4vd7fja...
